title: Advanced Mathematical Problem-Solving Strategies Using Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Gamification-enhanced mathematics problem-solving training course in a smartphone-based learning environment

learning_goals: Learners can solve complex mathematical problems with 85% or higher accuracy using gamification mechanisms (points, levels, badges).
In a gamified learning environment, learners can present and improve problem-solving strategies three or more times through competitive/collaborative tasks with peers.
Learners can analyze the impact of gamification design on learning attitudes through reflective journaling and write a report of over 1,000 characters.

resources: Gamification design toolkit (Canva templates, Kahoot!/Quizizz licenses)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
